text: Tattooed on My Brain is the 24th studio album by the Scottish hard rock band Nazareth. It was released on 12 October 2018 by Frontiers Records. It was produced by Yann Rouiller who also worked with Nazareth on their previous albums, The Newz (album) 2008 and Rock 'n' Roll Telephone 2014. It is the first Nazareth album not to feature the original singer Dan McCafferty who left the band in 2013. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Carl Sentance – lead vocals *Jimmy Murrison – guitars *Pete Agnew – bass guitar, backing vocals; lead vocals on "You Call Me" *Lee Agnew – drums ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Tattooed on My Brain on AllMusic Category:Nazareth (band) albums Category:2018 albums Category:Frontiers Records albums
title: Tattooed on My Brain
